shortdesc.ph: Sets the blocklist for video stream subscription.
Sets the video stream subscription blocklist.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeVideoBlocklist(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber) = 0;

ul.li: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The blocklist is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeAudio setting in .
Once the blocklist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is included in both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The blocklist is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeVideo setting in .
Once the blocklist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is added to both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.

plentry.pd: The list of user IDs whose video streams you do not want to subscribe to. To remove a user from the blocklist, call again with a new list that only includes the user IDs you still want to block.
The number of user IDs in the list.

List of user IDs whose video streams you do not want to subscribe to.
If you want to block a user's video stream, add their user ID to this list.
If you want to remove a user from the blocklist, call again with an updated list that only includes the user IDs you still want to block.
